label: 塩手麦
本: Commerce and Finance in the Middle Ages: The Beginnings of 'Capitalism'. ACTA ASIATICA, 81 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 2001-09
見出し読み: しおて の むぎ
見出し読み_mod: しおて の むぎ
説明文: The rice and barley that they were obliged to pay as part of their annual dues for the use of their land was handed over to them in kind (being called shiote no yone and shiote no mugi respectively), in exchange for which they paid their land tax in salt. 手塩米
